column5: Now that was wayyy too easy!! Since its up, this is a pic of my sauna @ my cottage. Anyone else have any sauna pics?
Test worked Sturgman!  photo is small untill you click it though.  I'll test my photo posting here with a few pics of buddy Joe's sauna!  Looks like you could drag it out on the ice!
hopefully this a pic of the sauna at Indian Lake that we flew into this summer  vance
Troutslayer, is there an outboard on the back of that sauna?  Sturgman, you stole my dog!
LOL!  I would be tempted to put it on pontoons as well as use it as an Ice Shack! It is a nice bit of carpentry.  It's in Joe's yard up in Manitouwadge!
